text:
e="preserve">Martin A. Sandoval (January 12, 1964 – December 5, 2020) was a Democratic politician. He admitted guilt to corruption charges in 2020. He was a member of the Illinois Senate from 2003 to 2020. Sandoval was born in Chicago.
On December 5, 2020, Sandoval died at a hospital in Chicago of COVID-19 at the age of 56.
